website_summaries.verdict: This 3-in-1 press makes patties, stuffed burgers, and sliders. It also comes with a smartphone-friendly recipe eBook.
pros: Press makes 4-inch patties or stuffed burgers, or 2 1/2-inch sliders
Comes with 60 stacking patty papers and a recipe eBook that works for smartphones and tablets
cons: Reports that this press isn't durable enough, and breaks easily
Some felt that the burgers came out too thick

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this Patty Buddy because it is so easy to use and clean. It makes perfect shaped burgers every time plus the fact you can stuff your burgers with cheese if you want to jazz them up a bit. My family loves burger night because they can gather in the kitchen and help make the burger they like best with the cheese or veggies they chose. I would say this to anyone thinking about buying one is what are you waiting for buy one and jazz up burger night with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Santa

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself already after using it just once
customer_reviews.text: We needed 20 plain hamburger patties. Instead of buying the pre-formed patties, we thought it might be more fun to make them ourselves. We thoroughly enjoyed the process. In addition, the combined cost of the burger press and the ground beef was much less than what we would have to pay for the pre-formed patties.
customer_reviews.author: shu lin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Making stuffed burgers is so much fun. Who knew how creative it can be until you try it out. We had so much fun exploring flavors and trying things as fillers and the burgers freeze perfectly. Great for kids to help make.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget just need to press down to make indent for stuffing and practiced enough to not have to use too much meat for each patty. I make gourmet burgers now lol ground turkey works great too
customer_reviews.author: yvonne hernandez

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it's worth, sorry!
customer_reviews.text: If the meat is cold, it requires a lot of force to make many patties with this gadget. If the meat is warmer, it sticks all over the parts and makes a greasy mess! I'd rather spend the money and get frozen, pre-made patties, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect burglets
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and makes the perfect sizes. Was great to make many burgers, and put the wax paper between and freeze. Burgers are made any way you like them spice wise. You can even stuff them with anything
customer_reviews.author: TJW

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yestetday, like a child wanted to try it out fast, and just using logic , I made two hamburgers ,made out of ground turkey and they Came out real nice and took seconds, its great , do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Myrin

customer_reviews.title: Makes a perfect sized hamburger
customer_reviews.text: My husband always complained that my homemade hamburgers were too thick. He complains no more! Now my hamburgers are the right size and round! As a bonus this is easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice convenient press
customer_reviews.text: Needs to make 6" patties to make up for shrinkage of burger.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Makes the perfect size patties so when cooking a batch of burgers they all cook even with one another. Stuffing the burger is super simple and easy to do. Well worth the money to make the perfect patties.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Giddens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome burger press!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this burger press! It does an amazing job in making perfect burgers every single time. It is easy to clean, with very little moving parts, which makes it perfect. Trust me i am VERY concerned about contamination and food hazard, and you want to be extra careful when handling raw meat. A durable burger press that is easy to clean is just awesome! Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Malvika B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but too small
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to form a hamburger, unfortunately, they are too small. That's the only reason I rated it a 4 instead of 5. Many people will like the size I assume.
customer_reviews.author: Lou G

customer_reviews.title: The Best Burger stuffer ever
customer_reviews.text: Before using the burger stuffer my burgers were flat too big or too small......NOW my burgers are perfect!!! Patty burger stuffer is thee ideal product to make the perfect best delicious burger ever...Great for cook outs,parties,and dinner parties. I wouldn't just take my word for it folks you gotta try it.....PLUS it comes with a cookBook for more ideas...what a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works really well even not using it to stuffp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased item for Christmas gift. I wish i had a video to see how it is used. I am very pleased anyway

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I can't wait to try stuffed burgers
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I can't wait to try stuffed burgers!!!

customer_reviews.title: Makes too thick burgers.
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be hard to use. It does work, but not as easy as I would like. The burgers are so thick. Would be nice if it was bigger around and the burgers could be flatter.
customer_reviews.author: greatshopper2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patties EVERYTIME
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the Deluxe Stuffed Burger Press. Prior to this I was making them all by hand. Resulted in inconsistency in the patties. No more! Perfect size, shape and the process was a breeze!

customer_reviews.title: use it for my ground turkey burgers.
customer_reviews.text: makes the same size burger so all my turkey is done at same time. wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing, I put some jalapenos and various cheeses in the middle of my burgers and they are amazing. Excellent for those who buy 10 pound tubes of beef and want to make patties to store in the freezer.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and use

customer_reviews.title: Made a awesome gift, they loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't know what to get a guy these work great, all of the guys loved it and they even called me up personally to thank me for them.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, saves time and mess.

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Stuffed Burger Press
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause I like stuffed burgers and I wanted to try making my own. This device made it very easy to do so and they turned out amazing (Bacon and Cheddar) Will definitely be making more with this!!

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Easy and Yummy
customer_reviews.text: It was simple and easy to use. Makes the perfect size burger and I loved the ebook!

customer_reviews.title: Love this burger press!
customer_reviews.text: The price is great and the press is fantastic! Ordering was easy and shipment fast. Finally can make a decent stuffed burger. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad found this neat little gadget. My burgers turn out perfect everytime. Best money I've ever spent. You should give it a try you will not be disappointed,

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen tool. Easy and fun to use. Cleans up well. Stores just as easily.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and the burgers come out consistently. It makes my hubby happy, so there you go.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Yum! Stuffed burgers!
customer_reviews.text: The Patty Buddy is sturdy and has a great recipe ebook! Can't wait to make some mac and cheese stuffed burgers!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Darr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in one day and I am truly impressed at how great this is for stuffed burgers! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Modesta Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Good burger
customer_reviews.text: This burger maker is pretty good, it's very sturdy and make a good size burger. I love the way how you can make stuffed burgers, pretty much put anything in the center of the patty. So this thing can make beef, lamb, pork very easily, but when it comes to chicken or Turkey, it sticks and does not release that easily. I tried oiling the surface, the top press comes off easily but the bottom part really sticks, I guess the only way to solve this problem is to use patty paper, then it would be perfect. All said and done it's an awesome patty maker, take the leap you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: zac60

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you need. All features you are looking for,
customer_reviews.text: Just received and made 3 pretty dukey burgers. Will take a little more practice to get it right. I put shredded cheddar and Muffeletta (olive salad) inside. Could've used less chop meat and more stuffing. I think the burgers are big enough for your standard store brand hamburger bun. Mine were max thick though with stuff inside. This has the removable bottom (can't see how you could manage without that), it's the right size, and includes a slider size just in case. Nonstick surface was fairly easy to clean. Can't wait to buy my chop meat that is on sale at Shoprite and make my burgers to freeze!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Tagliavia

customer_reviews.title: Gourmet hamburgers the easy way!
customer_reviews.text: This Patty Buddy helps you make perfectly formed hamburger patties and is a great tool to make stuffed hamburgers. The Ebook is easy to follow and has excellent recipes. Definitely a great buy that I will use for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Marty T

customer_reviews.title: Excited for future burgers!
customer_reviews.text: My bf scoffed at the idea of needing a burger press until I made us bacon and cheese stuffed burgers. It super easy to use and the burgers are a great size. The meat stuck a little, but nothing a quick spray of oil wont fix. I'm super excited this came with a slider press too! Such a great bargain and it feels super sturdy. My bf is now a big fan too.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Easily make great stuffed burgers
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I just purchased this burger press and wanted to give a try right away. We made cheddar stuffed burgers that turned out great. The only unfortunate thing was the ebook that should be on the website doesn't work. Edit: After contacting their customer service about the website issue they very quickly resolved the issue and sent me the ebook. Very impressed with their timely customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, great for making the perfectly uniformed burger without getting my hands dirty. Easy to size the thickness of each burger. Sturdy well made material easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: TSO

customer_reviews.title: ... they wouldn't have had as much meat as I like. Still getting used to using it though
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to make my burgers although I think if I had actually used it for stuffed burgers they wouldn't have had as much meat as I like. Still getting used to using it though.
customer_reviews.author: The GreyOne

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. I was looking for a press to form burgers LARGER than the buns. This was the largest (standard size) I could find. Bun sized. So I now just form the burgers in the press, put them on a plate and smoosh them down by hand. Oh well, it wasn't like I could really avoid handling the meat and still make the pattys anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Purchase you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome burger press! I made 24 burgers out of five pounds of ground beef. I even made some stuffed with cheddar and pepper jack cheese. I put them in the freezer and use them when I need them. I will be making more for my family cookout on Memorial day! It is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gospelmusiclady

customer_reviews.title: Just got them
customer_reviews.text: can't wait to put these to use maybe this weekend. Work OK for the price. Like being able to stuff even better comes with a slider mold to use for the small hamburgers...... pretty neat.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Use.
customer_reviews.text: We cooked up 6# of stuffed hamburger....Amazed at how tasty they are. Will get few more Patty Buddy machines for birthday gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but, you must still seal the edges by hand or the stuffings will leak out. Over all, Really nice unit, comes apart easily and is completely dishwasher safe.

product_meta.title: New! Deluxe Stuffed Burger Press with 60 Free Burger Papers & Exclusive Downloadable Recipe eBook, All in One Burger Maker, Slider & Hamburger Patty Press, BBQ Grilling & Gourmet Kitchen Tool
feature_bullets: ✓ PERFECTION WITH EACH PRESS - Say goodbye to tedious and messy patty molding and easily MAKE MULTIPLE PATTIES CONSISTENTLY and without worrying about the shape whilst MINIMISING WASTE. Now you can avoid expensive visits to diners and eateries by enjoy freshly made gourmet meals, that you can CUSTOMIZE and HEALTHIFY - All in the luxury and comfort of your home!

✓ SUPERIOR VERSATILITY – Whether it’s regular patties, stuffed burgers, sliders or minibugers, Patty Buddy is the ultimate kit in your kitchen. It’s simply the PERFECT GIFT for any food lover, whether they're into meat, fish or veggies, or even GLUTEN-FREE confectionery (Yes, you can make desserts too!)

✓ FOLLOW OUR RECIPES ON YOUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET – Our enchanting eBook contains OVER 20 HAND-PICKED RECIPES ranging from continental classics to healthy & contemporary masterpieces and exotic gourmets, for inspiring new and seasoned cooks alike! An in depth Patty Buddy tutorial and guide will ensure that you are ready to start making mouth-watering hamburgers! The eBook is optimized for you to follow on your smartphone & tablet while you prepare and cook patties!

✓ PARTY READY – Patty Buddy is also ideal for gatherings all year round, from summer barbecue parties to festive feasts! Get ready to have fun sharing and impressing your family & friends with your SUPREME PATTIES!

✓ PREMIUM QUALITY & SAFE –Patty Buddy is manufactured using the HIGHEST QUALITY ABS plastic that is both DURABLE AND ROBUST. We have also ensured it is BPA-Free so you can have a peace of mind whilst making succulent patties.
